config.immersivecompanions.title: Immersive Companions Config
config.immersivecompanions.enableCritica: When enabled, companions enter a weakened state at low health (crouching, slow movement, cannot attack)
config.immersivecompanions.criticalInjur: Health threshold (in half-hearts) at which companions become critically injured. Default: 4 (2 hearts)
Movement speed multiplier when critically injured. 0.5 = 50% speed. Default: 0.5
gui.immersivecompanions.recruitment.dial: I'll guard your back if you make it worth my while...
chat.immersivecompanions.recruited.1: <%s> You won't regret this. Let's go!
chat.immersivecompanions.recruited.2: <%s> Finally, a worthy employer. Lead the way.
chat.immersivecompanions.recruited.3: <%s> My blade is yours now. Where do we start?
chat.immersivecompanions.recruited.4: <%s> A fair deal. I'll watch your back out there.
chat.immersivecompanions.recruited.5: <%s> Consider me at your service. What's the plan?
chat.immersivecompanions.recruited.6: <%s> Wise choice. Together, we'll be unstoppable.
chat.immersivecompanions.recruited.7: <%s> I've been waiting for someone like you. Let's move.
chat.immersivecompanions.recruited.8: <%s> The emeralds are appreciated. Now, where's the action?
chat.immersivecompanions.recruited.9: <%s> You have my sword. And my loyalty.
chat.immersivecompanions.recruited.10: <%s> A new adventure begins! I'm ready when you are.
chat.immersivecompanions.recruited.11: <%s> I swear to protect you. On my honor.
chat.immersivecompanions.recruited.12: <%s> Good. I was getting bored guarding this village anyway.
stance.immersivecompanions.assist.desc: Assists owner and teammates in combat.
